topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b46a5e6368727cc97a0400#post_54b46a5e6368727cc97a0400
If a Pokemon from your game breeds with a Pokemon from another country, then the offspring has a higher chance of being shiny when it hatches. Around 1/1024 rather than the base 1/4096 chance.

topics.body:
More on the topic of if there's good people:
Hypothetically if there was no such thing as a good person would it really matter?  Metaphorically speaking a manmade diamond is worth less than a natural diamond and people care more about natural diamonds, but there is one thing a natural diamond can't do; take a concious act of a person to be created in the first place and even if it's manmade it's far more useful and manmade diamonds are used on everything from drills to wires.  They are far more useful cause without them a lot of people would be without jobs and in poverty.  Furthermore they can become more perfect than natural diamonds.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
